publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4786 Mike Pringle: Welcome to Lothian Buses’ Pink Top—That the Parliament applauds the responsiveness of Lothian Buses to the needs of its passengers; notes that since 2000 the company has provided easy access buses culminating in an entire fleet of low-floor easy access vehicles, and welcomes the trialling of the pink top service 22, which provides a dedicated unfolded buggy space in addition to wheelchair space thus increasing the travel capacity for disabled passengers and those with young children and folded or unfolded buggies.

S3M-4786 Welcome to Lothian Buses’ Pink Top (lodged on 4 September 2009) Bob Doris*, Ross Finnie*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jackie Baillie*, Ian McKee*, Rhoda Grant*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-4786 Welcome to Lothian Buses’ Pink Top (lodged on 4 September 2009) Malcolm Chisholm*, Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Robin Harper*
S3M-4786 Welcome to Lothian Buses’ Pink Top (lodged on 4 September 2009) Gil Paterson*, David Stewart*
S3M-4786 Welcome to Lothian Buses’ Pink Top (lodged on 4 September 2009) Bill Kidd*, Tom McCabe*
S3M-4786 Welcome to Lothian Buses’ Pink Top (lodged on 4 September 2009) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-4786 Welcome to Lothian Buses’ Pink Top (lodged on 4 September 2009) Peter Peacock*
